text: RuqK sAqmE vai dEqvEByO# yaqj~jAyA&ti#ShThamAnEq kRuShNO# rUqpaM kRuqtvA- &paqkramyA#tiShThatAqM tE#&manyantaq yaM ~MvA iqmE u#pAvaqrthsyataqH sa iqdaM Ba#viShyaqtItiq tE upA#mantrayantaq tE a#hOrAqtrayO$-rmahiqmAna#-mapaniqdhAya# dEqvAnuqpAva#rtEtAmEqSha vA RuqcO varNOq yacCuqklaM kRu#ShNAjiqnasyaiqSha sAmnOq yat kRuqShNamRu#KsAqmayOqH SilpE$ sthaq ityA#harKsAqmE EqvAva# rundha EqSha - [  ] 17
